issue_4_R_obs_mismatch.problem: R_obs ~ 10⁻²⁶ m vs ℓ_P ~ 10⁻³⁵ m (9 orders gap)

resolution.finding: The 10⁻²⁶ m value was an ERROR in the original report
resolution.correct_interpretation: R_obs depends on scale: QCD→10⁻¹⁵m, Planck→10⁻³⁵m, Hubble→10²⁶m

issue_5_multi_scale_incomplete.problem: Multi-scale extension only proven for QCD

resolution.QCD: ✅ PROVEN - equal amplitudes at stella octangula center
resolution.EW: 🔮 NOT REALIZED - H⁺=0, H⁰≠0 breaks equal amplitudes
resolution.GUT: 🔮 NOT REALIZED - doublet-triplet splitting breaks equal amplitudes
resolution.key_insight: Holographic formula ρ=M_P²H₀² is INDEPENDENT of scale-by-scale mechanisms

issue_6_spatial_averaging.problem: Position-dependent ρ_vac(x) must give uniform Λ

uniformity_mechanisms: Scale separation (41 orders between QCD and Hubble)
